entry.title: Welcome
entry.content:
All New Site!â€‹

Welcome to the soft launch of the new ARK Modding website. We have completely redesigned and built the site from the ground up using Docusaurus 3. We have also integrated this site with GitHub pages! Members of the community are invited to contribute to our site and help share their knowledge with others. To contribute, follow the guides under the Contributing category.

We would also like to invite new members to the community through our Discord. For the safety of the community, we do require game ownership verification, but this is a one-time process to join.

We look forward to working with you and seeing what crazy chaos comes of it.
